ProductInfo.Features:
Triplex: Live / Playback, Record, Network. Standard H.264 Video Compression with low bit rate and better image quality.
Support 2 Internal SATA HDDs (up to 6TB Storage Capacity). Support both iphone, Android Phone, and 4 Major Web Browsers (IE / Firefox / Safari / Chrome). Support HDMI, VGA, & BNC video output. USB Backup and USB Mouse.
CMS and web-based remote monitoring softeare. Up to 1280 x 1024 VGA Output Resolution.
Pre-Alarm Recording and Motion Detection. Dual-stream: network video and local recording.
Real-Time Recording/Playback (CIF@ 30fps/CH). CIF Recording Resolution Up to 240 FPS. D1 Recording Resolution Up to 60 FPS.
ProductInfo.Name: Digital Surveillance Recorder DVR 8-Channel H.264 Compression Standalone with Pre-Installed 2 TB Hard Drive Playback Internet & 3G Mobile Phone Accessible Smart Recording Real time for CCTV Camera Home Office Security System Network
